The study aim investigate pharmacodynamic equivalence pharmacokinetic bioequivalence new BK0023 injectable formulation filgrastim 0.3 mg/mL Bio-Ker S.r.l . vs. comparator ( Neupogen® 0.3 mg/mL , Dompé Biotec S.p.A. , Italy ) . Study design : Single multiple escalate dose , double-blind , randomised , two-way cross-over , pharmacodynamic pharmacokinetic bioequivalence study .
